languages.text: "Арильд, замолчи! Восход, не восход, а я лучше умру, чем дам себя изувечить этим безглазым! Все, умолкай и слушай {mf|Его|Ее} благородие! Он{mf||а} скажет нам, что делать!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"
languages.original_text: "Арильд, замолчи! Восход, не восход, а я лучше умру, чем дам себя изувечить этим безглазым! Все, умолкай и слушай {mf|Его|Ее} благородие! Он{mf||а} скажет нам, что делать!"

traits.locale_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks disfigure me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks disfigure me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"
"Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|H|Sh}e'll tell us what to you!"

languages.text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Aryld! Dämmerung hin oder her, ich sterbe eher, als mich von diesen augenlosen Freaks verstümmeln zu lassen! Also haltet den Mund und tut, was {mf|seine Lord|ihre Lady}schaft sagt! {mf|Er|Sie} wird uns sagen, was wir tun sollen!"
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Aryld! Dämmerung hin oder her, ich sterbe eher, als mich von diesen augenlosen Freaks verstümmeln zu lassen! Also haltet den Mund und tut, was {mf|seine Lord|ihre Lady}schaft sagt! {mf|Er|Sie} wird uns sagen, was wir tun sollen!"

languages.text: « Tiens ta langue, Aryld ! Aube ou pas, je préfère mourir plutôt que laisser ces monstres aveugles me mutiler ! Alors, tais-toi et obéis à Sa Seigneurie ! {mf|Il|Elle} nous dira quoi faire ! »
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: « Tiens ta langue, Aryld ! Aube ou pas, je préfère mourir plutôt que laisser ces monstres aveugles me mutiler ! Alors, tais-toi et obéis à Sa Seigneurie ! {mf|Il|Elle} nous dira quoi faire ! »

languages.text: “闭嘴，艾瑞德！管它什么黎明不黎明的，反正我宁可去死，也不想让那些没眼睛的怪物把我弄成残废！所以赶紧闭嘴吧，照大人所说的去做！{mf|他|她}会告诉我们该做什么！”
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴，艾瑞德！管它什么黎明不黎明的，反正我宁可去死，也不想让那些没眼睛的怪物把我弄成残废！所以赶紧闭嘴吧，照大人所说的去做！{mf|他|她}会告诉我们该做什么！”

languages.text: 「黙れ、アリルド！夜明けが来るかどうかにかかわらず、目なしの奇怪な者たちに私を傷つけさせる前に死ぬつもりだ！だから黙って、{mf|陛下|陛下}の言う通りにしろ！{mf|彼|彼女}が私たちに何をすべきか教えてくれるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、アリルド！夜明けが来るかどうかにかかわらず、目なしの奇怪な者たちに私を傷つけさせる前に死ぬつもりだ！だから黙って、{mf|陛下|陛下}の言う通りにしろ！{mf|彼|彼女}が私たちに何をすべきか教えてくれるだろう！」

languages.text: «¡Cierra el pico, Aryld! ¡Amanezca o no amanezca, moriré antes de dejar que esos monstruos sin ojos me mutilen! ¡Así que cállate y haz lo que diga mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Debemos seguir sus órdenes!».
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Cierra el pico, Aryld! ¡Amanezca o no amanezca, moriré antes de dejar que esos monstruos sin ojos me mutilen! ¡Así que cállate y haz lo que diga. ¡Él nos dirá qué hacer contigo!».

languages.text: "Diline hâkim ol Aryld! Başlatma şafağına! O gözsüz manyaklardan işkence göreceğime ölürüm daha iyi! O yüzden sus ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ne buyurursa yap! O, en iyisini bilir!"
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Aryld! Dawn or no dawn, I'll die before I let those eyeless freaks maim me! So keep quiet and do as {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship says! {mf|He|She}'ll tell us what to do!"

traits.locale_text: "Diline hâkim ol Aryld! Başlatma şafağına! O gözsüz manyaklardan işkence göreceğime ölürüm daha iyi! O yüzden sus ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ne buyurursa yap! O, en iyisini bilir!"
